translation.en: Yeah?
Yeah.
On my way.
Seriously?
It's a holiday.
Bad guys don't take a holiday.
translation.it: I bambini cattivi non vanno in vacanza.

translation.en: Go back to sleep.
I was hoping we could talk.
Yeah, I gotta go.
So you're still upset?
I'm not upset. I'm just late.
translation.it: Non sono arrabbiato. Sono solo in ritardo.

translation.en: Call you later?
ELLEN: The Monfell Shipping Center
translation.it: PACIFICO OCCIDENTALE STRUTTURA ALLENAMENTI TATTICI Il Centro Spedizioni di Monfell è stato inattivo negli ultimi sei mesi.

translation.en: has been non-operational for the last six months.
translation.it: Il Centro Spedizioni di Monfell è stato inattivo negli ultimi sei mesi.

translation.en: Since its closure, it's become a favorite location
translation.it: Dalla sua chiusura, è diventato il posto preferito dei São Paulo Locos...

translation.en: for Sao Paulo Locos to conduct business.
translation.it: Dalla sua chiusura, è diventato il posto preferito dei São Paulo Locos... ...per fare affari.

translation.en: They've come and gone as they please with minimal resistance.
translation.it: Vanno e vengono come gli pare e piace senza nessun problema.

translation.en: That ends today.
Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.it: Questa notte, un container è arrivato a Monfell da Bogotá.

translation.en: Due to the amount of chatter, DEA believes
this could be their largest shipment of contraband to date.
translation.it: ...la DEA crede che sia il più grosso carico di contrabbando mai fatto.

translation.en: The source couldn't identify exactly what was coming in.
translation.it: La fonte non ha identificato il contenuto.

translation.en: So whether it's money, arms, or the ghost of Pablo Escobar, be ready.
translation.it: Che siano soldi, armi o il fantasma di Pablo Escobar, tenetevi pronti.

translation.en: Secure the scene, help find the container.
translation.it: Mettete al sicuro la zona, aiutate a trovare il container.

translation.en: Once you've done that, you all can go enjoy your holiday.
translation.it: Dopodiché, potrete tornare a godervi le vostre vacanze.

translation.en: TRAVIS: We're just barbecuing.
It's a whole thing.
How about you? SOPHIA: I don't have any plans.
translation.it: - E tu? - Non avevo niente in programma.

translation.en: You should come over. Yeah?
Yeah. Carley and Becky would love to see you.
translation.it: Carley e Becky sarebbero entusiasti di vederti.

translation.en: Not me. I'm sick to death of you.
translation.it: Io, no, non ti sopporto più.

translation.en: Sorry to ruin your holiday.
You ruin every day, El. Why should today be an exception?
translation.it: È così ogni giorno, El, oggi non è un'eccezione.

translation.en: Don't call me "El."
When did this come down?
Got a call from DEA at 2. Why?
translation.it: Mi ha chiamato la DEA alle 2. Perché?

translation.en: TRAVIS: A little short notice. ELLEN: We've had shorter.
translation.it: - Un po' scarso come preavviso. - C'è stato di peggio.

translation.en: Yeah.
Don't get that big brain of yours thinking, Travis. It only gets you in trouble.
translation.it: Non cominciare a scervellarti o ti metterai solo nei guai.

translation.en: Inspiring as always. ELLEN: And don't fuck up.
translation.it: - Una grande motivatrice. - E non fare cazzate.

translation.en: Let's go.
Ward? Hello?
WARD: What's this? PHOENIX: What we're looking for.
Yeah, it's pretty. BENSON: Hey, Chu.
Why don't you come down to the beach later?
translation.it: Perché non vieni alla spiaggia, dopo? Faccio una festa.

translation.en: I'm having a party. No, I got plans.
translation.it: Perché non vieni alla spiaggia, dopo? Faccio una festa. No, ho da fare.

translation.en: BENSON: It's your loss. PHIL: Benson.
Why would she go to your party? Aren't you too old for this?
translation.it: - Perché dovrebbe? - Non sei un po' troppo vecchio?

translation.en: Just entering my prime. [LAUGHTER]
Yo, I'm not doing anything. How come I didn't get an invite?
translation.it: Io non ho fatto nulla. Perché non sono stato invitato?

translation.en: Remember what happened last time you came?
translation.it: Ti ricordi cos'hai fatto l'ultima volta?

translation.en: No. Ask his wife.
All right, simmer down. Simmer down.
A little calm-before-the-storm levity.
translation.it: Un po' di calma prima della tempesta.

translation.en: There's not gonna be a storm.
What makes you say that? They've been getting lazy.
translation.it: - Cosa te lo fa pensare? - Si sono impigriti.

translation.en: We've been letting them do a few scores, and now they feel safe.
translation.it: Li abbiamo fatti vincere qualche volta, e ora si sentono al sicuro.

translation.en: Well, I guess we got all dolled up for nothing.
translation.it: Credo che ci siamo messi in ghingheri per nulla.

translation.en: TRAVIS [OVER COMM]: I don't give a damn what the DEA says.
translation.it: Me ne fotto di quello che dice la DEA.

translation.en: We go in heavy, stay frosty.
Watch each other's backs
stick to the plan, stay tight.
Let's do this.
CHU: Drop the phone and keep your hands where I can see them.
translation.it: Lascia cadere il telefono e metti le mani in vista.

translation.en: That was sloppy, Chu.
WARD: All, we have guard one on lockdown. Surveillance is ours.
translation.it: La prima guardia è all'entrata. La sorveglianza è nostra.

translation.en: TRAVIS [OVER COMM]: Copy.
WARD: The yard's clear.
We got another guard on the east-side stairwell.
translation.it: Abbiamo un'altra guardia nella tromba delle scale a est.

translation.en: [GUNS COCKING] CHU: Hands! Now.
MAN: Clear.
Knees.
How many others are there?
Sophie, anything?
Nothing. This was supposed to be a shipping yard.
translation.it: Niente. Questo era un cantiere navale.

translation.en: I don't see any containers. TRAVIS: Copy that.
Come on, do you have to do that?
Sorry.
You sure this is the right place?
translation.it: Sei sicuro che sia il posto giusto?

translation.en: This is the place.
Let's go.
Jackpot. Copy. Where are you?
Outside. Northwest side of the warehouse.
translation.it: Fuori. A nord ovest del magazzino.

translation.en: Copy. Ward, stay where you are.
Everyone else, meet at the shipping container.
Copy that.
Look to your left.
Copy. Straight ahead, guys.
I've got 10 to 12 hostiles coming in hot from inside the warehouse.
translation.it: Sono usciti 10 o 12 energumeni dal magazzino, stanno avanzando.

translation.en: [GUNFIRE] WARD: Take cover! Take cover!
SOPHIA: Take cover!
Cover me.
You okay? I'm all right.
I got you covered. Go.
PHIL: Gotta get her out!
Stay down. You're gonna be okay.
Are you hit?
Just got the vest.
Cover. Go, go, go.
Now you're both being sloppy.
You owe me a beer.
MAN: Let go! Let go! Little help here.
translation.it: - Lasciami stare! - Serve una mano, qui.

translation.en: My arm!
My arm! Yard's secure.
My arm!
What the fuck?
It's a fucking suicide vest.
What are you wearing this for? Go fuck yourself.
Inside's secure.
What the fuck?
PHOENIX [ON COMM]: We need an ambulance!
TRAVIS [ON COMM]: I'm on it.
Fuck. Phil.
Phil!
I got Phoenix. Let me see if it went through your vest.
translation.it: Sono con Phoenix. Fa' vedere se ha forato il giubbotto.

translation.en: I got you.
"It's not gonna be a storm."
Cover!
Cut him down.
TRAVIS: I don't know why some crazy motherfucker
translation.it: Non so perché quei figli di puttana...

translation.en: would put on a suicide vest.
That's not our problem anymore.
translation.it: Non è un più un problema nostro, comunque.

translation.en: All right, fine.
Let go! Let go! My arm! SOPHIA: That's Diego.
He won't shut up, and the guy we cut down's not talking.
translation.it: Lui non sta zitto un attimo, e l'altro non dice una parola.

translation.en: What'd Dwyer say?
She's sending a wagon.
What? Why?
translation.it: Cosa? - Perché? - Vuole che li portiamo con noi.

translation.en: She wants us to bring 'em in.
translation.it: - Perché? - Vuole che li portiamo con noi.

translation.en: I thought this was DEA. The DEA guys are dead.
translation.it: - Non riguarda la DEA? - Alla DEA son tutti morti.

translation.en: She can't get a hold of brass.
Fucking Fourth. Until she does, we hang onto 'em.
translation.it: Fottuto 4 luglio. Finché non rispondono, restano a noi.

translation.en: We should keep 'em. Fuck the DEA.
Fuck them all. These assholes killed Phil.
They should defer to us. We're bringing 'em in.
translation.it: - Devono rimettersi a noi. - Dobbiamo portarli dentro.

translation.en: SOPHIA: What a mess.
LARS: Most people are under the impression
that since the Southern states were in favor of slavery,
translation.it: ...che dato che gli stati meridionali erano schiavisti...

translation.en: that they insisted on the Three-Fifths Compromise
found in Article 1, Section 2 of the Constitution
that determined that slaves are only worth three-fifths a person.
translation.it: ...che stabiliva che gli schiavi valessero solo 3/5 di una persona.

translation.en: It was, in fact, the North that did this.
translation.it: In realtà era il Nord ad insistere su questo articolo.

translation.en: The South would have loved to have counted each slave twice,
translation.it: Il Sud avrebbe desiderato che ogni schiavo valesse doppio...

translation.en: and the North, rightly so,
didn't believe that the slaves that didn't have the right to vote
translation.it: ...credeva che gli schiavi senza diritto di voto non dovessero...

translation.en: should count equally to those that did.
That would've given the South more power
translation.it: Questo avrebbe dato più potere elettorale al Sud...

translation.en: to put their influence on the North.
And what's your point?
I thought we were chatting.
[PHONE BEEPS ON] Yes?
MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: You've come an awful long way for nothing.
translation.it: Hai fatto un sacco di strada per niente.

translation.en: It's not that far. Who is this?
Just listen.
Diego fucked up.
He lost Scorpion.
And you have him?
MAN [ON SPEAKER]: Not that simple.
But I know where he is and how to get him.
translation.it: Ma io so dove si trova e come prenderlo.

translation.en: Fifty million.
We both know he's worth 10 times that.
translation.it: Sappiamo entrambi che vale 10 volte tanto.

translation.en: I don't think this is a game you wanna play.
translation.it: Non credo che tu stia parlando sul serio.

translation.en: You don't know who you're dealing...
translation.it: - Non sai con chi hai... - Ti darò le istruzioni.

translation.en: I'll be in touch with instructions.
translation.it: - Non sai con chi hai... - Ti darò le istruzioni. CHIAMATA TERMINATA

translation.en: ...with.
Two hundred years ago, it was so much easier to buy a human being.
translation.it: Duecento anni fa, era molto più semplice comprare un uomo.

translation.en: Check out his story. If it's true?
translation.it: - Senti questa storia. - E se fosse vero?

translation.en: It's a fucking Scorpion.
I don't wanna lose him.
Not now. Not again.
TRAVIS: York.
We're short-handed. Help Sophie process our guests.
translation.it: Siamo in pochi. Aiuta Sofi a esaminare gli ospiti.

translation.en: Got it, Commander.
My arm! It's fucking broken. I'll break your other one. Move it.
translation.it: - Il braccio! È rotto, cazzo. - Muoviti o ti rompo anche l'altro.

translation.en: Move.
I thought I made myself clear.
We got jumped, and not by some--
translation.it: Siamo stati assaliti, e non da--

translation.en: You say that, and all I hear is you weren't prepared.
translation.it: Riesco solo a sentire che non eravate preparati.

translation.en: What happened? Your team take it easy because it's a holiday?
translation.it: L'avete presa sotto gamba perché oggi è festivo?

translation.en: What was the DEA onto? What do you mean?
translation.it: Cosa cercava la DEA? - In che senso? - Dai, Ellen. È una cosa assurda.

translation.en: Come on, Ellen. This is so fucked.
translation.it: - In che senso? - Dai, Ellen. È una cosa assurda.

translation.en: Clearly, they weren't honest with us. All we know is what they told us.
translation.it: - Non sono stati chiari con noi. - Sappiamo solo cosa ci hanno detto.

translation.en: They acted on a tip that 500 million in product was moving through Monfell.
translation.it: Hanno avuto la soffiata che 500 milioni sarebbero passati da Monfell.

translation.en: And what's it turn out to be?
A guy in a box.
Protected by heavily armed Sao Paulo Locos soldiers--
translation.it: Protetto da soldati di São Paulo Locos armati fino ai denti.

translation.en: Their tip was wrong. What do you want me to say?
translation.it: La soffiata era sbagliata. Cosa vuoi che ti dica?

translation.en: That doesn't make them fucking liars.
translation.it: Questo non li trasforma in stronzi bugiardi.

translation.en: So what do we do now?
I have calls in. No one's around.
Until we get answers, we sit tight.
Fuck that. I'm gonna talk to them. No, you're not.
translation.it: - Fanculo, gli voglio parlare. - No, non puoi.

translation.en: You're gonna leave them be.
They're the feds' problem. Jesus Christ.
translation.it: - È un problema dei federali. - Cristo.

translation.en: Phil is dead. Don't you wanna know why?
translation.it: Phil è morto. Non vuoi saperne la ragione?

translation.en: Right now all I'm thinking about is what I'm gonna tell his family.
translation.it: In questo momento sto solo pensando a cosa dovrò dire alla sua famiglia.

translation.en: Elevator to lobby. Fine.
Lobby, please.
[DOOR BUZZES] Watch those sudden stops, boy!
translation.it: Attento a questi stop repentini, ragazzo.

translation.en: Somebody could get hurt.
It's a big place.
And they've got their Christmas decorations up already.
translation.it: E non hanno ancora tolto le decorazioni di Natale.

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas.
Uh, Mr. C, I wasn't...
Make yourselves at home.
translation.it: Fate come se foste a casa vostra.

translation.en: Welcome.
Confound it, somebody better nail that down.
Could take a nasty fall from a loose board.
translation.it: Si potrebbe cadere da una tavola pericolante.

translation.en: Oh, I just...
Lord help the whole thing.
Nicholas. Did you do what I asked?
translation.it: Nicholas. Hai fatto come ti ho chiesto?

translation.en: Yes, yes. Yes.
I did. Let me just show you.
So I was able to tap into a security camera across from the shipping center.
translation.it: Sono riuscito a entrare nelle telecamere di sicurezza del cantiere.

translation.en: Where did they take him?
S.W.A.T.'s got him back at their place.
translation.it: La SWAT l'ha portato nella sua struttura.

translation.en: It's their renovated facility in the middle of nowhere.
translation.it: È il loro nuovo centro servizi in mezzo al nulla.

translation.en: Sounds like the paint isn't even dry yet. How do you know?
translation.it: - Sembra che sia fresco di vernice. - Come lo sai?

translation.en: I heard it on my police scanner.
translation.it: L'ho sentito dalla radio della Polizia.

translation.en: LARS: Well done, Nicholas.
Now...
Can you trace the number that called this phone?
translation.it: ...puoi tracciare il numero che ha chiamato qui?

translation.en: Find out who and where they are?
translation.it: Chi è e dove si trova?

translation.en: I can try. Try hard.
Of course. No problem.
ELLEN: Melissa, Phil pulled Phoenix out of harm's way just before he got shot.
translation.it: Melissa, Phil ha messo in salvo Phoenix prima di essere ucciso.

translation.en: He was a hero.
Yes.
You have my word.
Whoever's responsible for this is gonna pay.
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: I'm sorry, I can't leave now.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Non posso andarmene ora.

translation.en: No, I understand. Should I cancel today?
translation.it: No, capisco. Devo disdire per oggi?

translation.en: No, don't do that.
You okay? Yeah. Yeah.
Yeah?
I'm really sorry.
I love you.
It's our turn in the neighborhood
translation.it: È il nostro turno per fare la grigliata...

translation.en: to host the holiday barbecue,
translation.it: È il nostro turno per fare la grigliata... ...e Carley sta cucinando per 22 bambini e i loro genitori.

translation.en: so Carley's at home making the food for 22 kids and their parents.
translation.it: ...e Carley sta cucinando per 22 bambini e i loro genitori.

translation.en: What's up? Elson called. Said to come down.
translation.it: - Cosa c'è? - Ha chiamato Elson. Dice di scendere.

translation.en: SOPHIA: Carley still mad at you?
She's not mad at me.
Sorry, man, I'm on her side.
What--? There's no side. She's not mad at me.
translation.it: Cosa? Non c'è nessuna parte, non è arrabbiata con me.

translation.en: Besides, you can't be on her side. You're my partner.
translation.it: Non puoi stare dalla sua parte, sei la mia collega.

translation.en: That's a brotherhood.
Yeah, but Carley's like my sister.
translation.it: Sì, ma lei è come mia sorella.

translation.en: Sisterhood trumps brotherhood-- That's bullshit.
translation.it: - E le sorelle vincono sui fratelli. - Che stronzate.

translation.en: Look,
you decided before you got married that you only wanted one kid, right?
translation.it: ...prima di sposarti hai detto che volevi un solo figlio.

translation.en: Yeah. That was like 10 years ago.
But out of the blue, you say you want another kid.
translation.it: Ma poi, di punto in bianco, hai detto che ne volevi un altro.

translation.en: Yeah, I said maybe we could think about having another kid,
translation.it: Sì, ho detto che forse potevamo pensare di averne un altro.

translation.en: then it became-- You wanna know what she heard?
translation.it: - È poi è diventato... - Sai per lei che vuol dire?

translation.en: You wanna have another baby that she'll have to carry for nine months.
translation.it: Che vuoi un altro figlio che lei deve portarsi dentro per nove mesi.

translation.en: She's gonna have to walk away from work after all she's accomplished.
translation.it: Poi dovrà mettersi in aspettativa per il lavoro dopo il parto.

translation.en: She's gonna wake up 10 times a night to feed and change the kid
translation.it: Dovrà svegliarsi 10 volte ogni notte per nutrirlo e cambiarlo...

translation.en: because you're always off doing this.
translation.it: ...perché tu hai sempre da fare al lavoro.

translation.en: She heard all that with "maybe"? Yes.
translation.it: "Forse" significava tutto questo per lei? Sì.

translation.en: ELSON: I don't know. No, no, no, dude.
translation.it: Non lo so. No, no, no, amico. Esce sempre errore.

translation.en: It just keeps coming up with an error.
translation.it: No, no, no, amico. Esce sempre errore.

translation.en: I don't know. It's some sort of remote-access bug.
translation.it: Non so. È una specie di bug dell'accesso remoto.

translation.en: Have you ever seen it?
Yeah, I tried that. I tried that.
Oh, are you kidding me?
Yes, I had that in the queue. While we're young.
translation.it: - Ce l'avevo in coda. - Prima che si faccia notte.

translation.en: I gotta go.
Please don't touch that.
What do you got?
Our friend Diego is a bad, bad dude.
translation.it: Il nostro Diego è un ragazzo molto cattivo.

translation.en: From Honduras, okay?
Joined the Sao Paulo Locos, known as the S.P.L., when he was 6.
translation.it: Si è unito ai São Paulo Locos, detti SPL quando aveva sei anni.

translation.en: He's now a friggin' lieutenant.
Okay. What about our mystery man?
translation.it: - E il nostro uomo misterioso? - Scorpion?

translation.en: Scorpion? Is that what we're calling him?
translation.it: - E il nostro uomo misterioso? - Scorpion? L'abbiamo soprannominato così?

translation.en: Yeah, for now.
Nada on him. He's not in any active database.
translation.it: Niente. Non è in nessun database attivo.

translation.en: What about other databases?
Such as? FBI? CIA? DoD?
I don't have clearance to tap those.
But you could probably do it without clearance, right?
Are you asking me or telling me?
There's no way a guy protected by S.P.L.'s best is a ghost.
translation.it: Non è possibile che un tipo protetto dall'SPL sia un fantasma.

translation.en: Just find out who he is.
You got it, boss.
Hey, put Diego in room one.
Get him to talk, have Ward listen in. What are you gonna do?
translation.it: - Fallo parlare, fallo sentire da Ward. - E tu cosa farai?

translation.en: I'm gonna go talk to...Scorpion.
Dwyer's gonna lose her shit.
Let me worry about Dwyer.
Hey, Diego. We meet again.
You broke my fucking arm.
I gave you the choice to have your arm broken or not.
translation.it: Ti ho chiesto se volevi che te lo rompessi oppure no.

translation.en: You chose poorly.
Now, explain something to me.
Why would a lieutenant be put on babysitting duty?
translation.it: Perché un luogotenente viene adibito a baby-sitter?

translation.en: Did they demote you, Diego?
Go fuck yourself, puta.
Who's the man in the box? You wanna know who he is?
translation.it: - Chi è l'uomo nella scatola? - Lo vuoi sapere?

translation.en: That's who he is. He's the fucking devil!
translation.it: Ecco chi è. Il diavolo in persona.

translation.en: Want something to drink?
You need a medic? It's a holiday, but I could have it arranged.
translation.it: Ti serve un medico. È festa oggi, ma posso procurartelo.

translation.en: Am I being charged with a crime?
That depends.
On...? Who are you?
Have you asked Diego who I am?
translation.it: Hai chiesto a Diego chi sono?

translation.en: What's that?
He said that this was going to happen.
He said they'd come and he'd escape.
translation.it: Che sarebbero arrivati e sarebbe scappato.

translation.en: Who would escape? Diego--
You're all fucking dead. You don't know it.
translation.it: Siete tutti morti. Non lo sapete.

translation.en: You tell them I did this, okay?
You tell them I did this.
Hey, stop.
Diego, stop! Help!
I need some help in here!
Perhaps you should attend to that.
SOPHIA: Stop it.
Oh, God.
What the fuck happened?
He just impaled himself.
TRAVIS: You're kidding me.
Fuck me.
Who the fuck are you?
You have blood on your hands.
translation.it: Hai le mani sporche di sangue.

translation.en: Answer the question.
Did you kill him?
He killed himself.
Cracked his skull wide open.
translation.it: Si è spaccato il cranio in due.

translation.en: We do not have much time.
I'm not asking again.
What is important is that you listen.
You may think the events of today were in error,
translation.it: Tu pensi che oggi sia successo tutto per errore...

translation.en: but I assure you, my friend, they were not.
translation.it: ...ma ti assicuro che non è così.

translation.en: You better start answering my questions.
translation.it: È meglio che tu risponda alle mie domande.

translation.en: I have information in my head worth billions of dollars.
translation.it: Io ho delle informazioni in testa che valgono miliardi di dollari.

translation.en: What kind of information?
The kind that can set the world on fire.
translation.it: Quelle che fanno scoppiare una guerra.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, enough with the fucking riddles.
translation.it: Cristo, basta con gli indovinelli del cazzo.

translation.en: Fine. Here is the truth.
Very soon, you will be told that officers
translation.it: Tra poco ti diranno che degli agenti di un'agenzia federale sono qui...

translation.en: from a federal agency are here to take me into custody.
translation.it: Tra poco ti diranno che degli agenti di un'agenzia federale sono qui... ...per prendermi sotto custodia.

translation.en: They are not what they say they are.
translation.it: Non sono chi dicono di essere.

translation.en: Do not let these men take me.
Do this, and I will help you to survive what is coming next.
translation.it: Se lo fai, ti aiuterò a sopravvivere a quello che sta per succedere.

translation.en: FBI's here for him now. What?
translation.it: - L'FBI è arrivata a prenderlo. - Cosa?

translation.en: I told you I had calls in.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che hanno chiamato.

translation.en: We're handing him over, so we can all go home.
translation.it: Glielo consegniamo, così ce ne andiamo tutti a casa.

translation.en: Did they say who he was? A known terrorist.
translation.it: - Ti hanno detto chi è? - Un terrorista.

translation.en: Someone they've been after for a while.
translation.it: Uno che stavano cercando da un po'.

translation.en: Where are they? Lobby.
I'll take care of it.
I'll bring them to him, pass him off.
translation.it: Glielo porto io, gli passo il caso.

translation.en: Gentlemen, you're here for the prisoner.
translation.it: Signori, siete qui per il prigioniero.

translation.en: Commander Hall. I'm Agent Franklin. My partner, Agent Cox.
translation.it: Comandante Hall, agente Franklin. Il mio collega, l'agente Cox.

translation.en: Sorry for the delay. No problem.
translation.it: - Scusate per il ritardo. - Nessun problema.

translation.en: We appreciate you hanging on to our guy.
translation.it: Grazie per aver tenuto il nostro uomo.

translation.en: Right this way.
That's funny, I thought all you FBI guys used Berettas.
translation.it: Buffo, credevo che all'FBI usaste tutti la Beretta.

translation.en: These are our personal weapons.
On the job? It's a holiday.
So what'd this guy do to get on your database, anyway?
translation.it: Cos'ha fatto questo uomo per essere sul vostro database?

translation.en: Terrorist stuff. Things we're not to discuss.
translation.it: - Cose da terrorista. - Non siamo autorizzati a parlarne.

translation.en: "Terrorist stuff." What's his name?
Heh. Come on. His name can't be a matter of national security.
translation.it: Su, il nome non può certo essere coperto per difendere la sicurezza nazionale.

translation.en: Well, look, it's clear you guys aren't FBI, so no fooling.
translation.it: Bene, è evidente che non siete dell'FBI, basta con gli scherzi.

translation.en: Who are you?
Just hand the prisoner over.
Not until I get some answers.
You are dead, motherfucker.
Drop the knife now! Now! Oh, fuck.
CHU: Hands on your head.
Knees.
You all right, Commander? Prick.
Got him? Yeah, we got him.
Commander? Commander!
You trust me now?
CHU: Hooks.
Hands on your head.
Let's go.
You all right, Commander? Yeah, yeah.
translation.it: - Tutto a posto, comandante? - Sì, sì.

translation.en: WARD: Keep moving.
Keys, cowboy.
I'm going to enjoy watching you die.
translation.it: Ora mi godo lo spettacolo della tua morte.

translation.en: Shut the fuck up.
Everything happened the way he said it would.
translation.it: È andato tutto come ha previsto.

translation.en: Our mystery man's not even in the FBI's database.
translation.it: Il nostro uomo misterioso non c'è nemmeno nel database dell'FBI.

translation.en: Wait. How do you know that?
translation.it: Il nostro uomo misterioso non c'è nemmeno nel database dell'FBI. Aspetta, come lo sai?

translation.en: You hacked the FBI database?
Just a bit.
Look, on the way to the shipping center,
I made a crack to Agent Weir about this being the calm before the storm,
translation.it: ...ho fatto una battuta a Weir sulla quiete prima della tempesta...

translation.en: and he said there wasn't gonna be a storm.
translation.it: ...e lui ha detto che non sarebbe stata una tempesta.

translation.en: I don't think they were expecting any resistance,
translation.it: Non si aspettavano di trovare resistenza...

translation.en: which is odd, don't you think? It doesn't matter.
translation.it: - ...il che è assurdo, non credi? - Non fa niente.

translation.en: There is a protocol we need to follow-- Oh, fuck the protocol, Ellen!
translation.it: - Dobbiamo seguire il protocollo. - Fanculo il protocollo, Ellen!

translation.en: This isn't the end of it.
We lost enough guys today. I don't wanna lose more.
translation.it: Abbiamo perso dei ragazzi, non voglio perderne altri.

translation.en: You're a cop, right? At least you were before you put the jacket on.
translation.it: Eri una poliziotta, no? Prima di metterti la tua bella giacca.

translation.en: What does your gut tell you?
Let's see what he has to say.
TRAVIS: You know this man?
He actually just tried to kill me to get to you.
translation.it: Ha cercato di uccidermi per arrivare a te.

translation.en: SCORPION: I've never seen him before, but I know more like him will be coming.
translation.it: Non l'ho mai visto prima, ma credo che ne arriveranno altri.

translation.en: Many more. Why won't you tell us your name?
translation.it: - Molti altri. - Perché non ci dici come ti chiami?

translation.en: That is for your protection.
The less you know... TRAVIS: Well...
The ink on your back's not Sao Paulo Locos,
translation.it: ...il tatuaggio non è dei São Paulo Locos...

translation.en: nor does it rep any of their rivals, so you're clearly not a part of that game.
translation.it: ...né di una banda rivale, quindi non fai parte di quel mondo.

translation.en: My guess is you're Special Ops.
translation.it: Io credo che tu sia nelle Forze Speciali.

translation.en: You've been tortured, from the looks of it, more than once.
translation.it: Sembra che tu abbia subito delle torture più di una volta.

translation.en: You could have easily escaped our compound,
translation.it: Saresti riuscito a scappare facilmente, ma hai scelto di non farlo.

translation.en: but you chose not to. Why?
translation.it: Saresti riuscito a scappare facilmente, ma hai scelto di non farlo. Perché?

translation.en: You need our protection
because everyone and their mother's coming after you
because what you know
could cause blowback.
It is far more complicated than that.
translation.it: È molto più complicato di così.

translation.en: Fill me in here. What am I missing?
Because I believe you when you say more like him are coming.
translation.it: Ti credo quando dici che ne arriveranno altri come lui.

translation.en: But you're gonna have to square-up with me
if you want us to do more than just turn you over.
You were correct about Special Ops,
but that was only in the beginning.
I quickly realized that information was true power.
translation.it: Ho scoperto presto che il vero potere risiede nell'informazione.

translation.en: So you're a spy. And I have the goods on everyone.
translation.it: - Allora, sei una spia. - E conosco i segreti di tutti.

translation.en: What is it?
I traced the cell phone. LARS: Who is it?
translation.it: - Ho tracciato il telefono. - Chi è?

translation.en: I don't have a "who",
but I have where the call originated from.
translation.it: ...ma so da dove è partita la chiamata.

translation.en: Okay. So, what happened? How'd you end up in our cell?
translation.it: Quindi, cos'è successo? Come sei arrivato nella nostra cella?

translation.en: made a mistake in Bogotá.
So why'd they capture you? Why not kill you?
translation.it: E perché non ti hanno preso e ucciso?

translation.en: To facilitate my sale.
ELLEN: Bullshit. The S.P.L. knows their lane.
translation.it: Stronzate. L'SPL sa come agire. Non sono certo idioti che non sanno vendere.

translation.en: They're not dumb enough to trade in that game.
translation.it: L'SPL sa come agire. Non sono certo idioti che non sanno vendere.

translation.en: No, but others do.
Who, then? Unsure.
translation.it: - E chi? - Non lo so con certezza.

translation.en: SCORPION: But one thing I am sure of:
translation.it: Ma di una cosa sono certo:

translation.en: Someone from your team is involved.
translation.it: qualcuno della vostra squadra è coinvolto.

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas, who are these people?
Show me who we're up against.
Where you going, Travis?
Commander? I'm moving him.
Where?
Not alone. The team should be in on this.
translation.it: Non da solo, lo faremo tutti insieme.

translation.en: Just me. What, are you crazy?
translation.it: - Vado da solo. - Ma sei pazzo?

translation.en: That doesn't make any sense. Nothing about today makes sense.
translation.it: - Non ha senso. - Oggi, niente ha senso.

translation.en: If I tell you where I'm going,
translation.it: Se ti dicessi dove sto andando...

translation.en: they could get it out of you. They wouldn't be able to.
They're coming for him, Sof,
and they're not gonna stop.
I won't let another person I care about die today.
translation.it: Non voglio che muoia un'altra persona a cui tengo.

translation.en: If they know he's here, they could be watching the compound, and--
translation.it: Se sanno che è qui, staranno monitorando la struttura.

translation.en: I'll have Elson review the area.
translation.it: Dico a Elson di controllare l'area.

translation.en: Thanks.
I'm moving you.
Moving me will not keep them from coming for me.
translation.it: Questo non gli impedirà di trovarmi.

translation.en: No, but it'll keep them from my team,
translation.it: No, ma almeno staranno lontani dalla mia squadra...

translation.en: and that's my priority.
It's how it's gotta be.
Yo, Commander, what's going on?
Hey. Just saw Hall taking Scorpion out.
translation.it: Ehi. Ho appena visto Hall che usciva con Scorpion.

translation.en: What do you mean, "out"?
It's him.
Hello? MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: Listen to me carefully.
You don't have much time.
How we looking?
Yeah, yeah. Everything looks good. No unusual activity.
translation.it: Bene, tutto a posto. Nessuna attività insolita.

translation.en: SOPHIA: "Remote access error." What is that?
translation.it: "Errore di accesso remoto". Cosa vuol dire?

translation.en: ELSON: That? I don't know.
That has been bugging me all day.
translation.it: È tutto il giorno che ha questo bug.

translation.en: MAN [ON COMM]: I'm in position.
Did you disable the camera that shows our sniper?
translation.it: Hai disattivato la telecamera che inquadra il cecchino?

translation.en: What I did was record footage before he got there,
translation.it: Ho registrato dei video prima che arrivasse...

translation.en: and just have it playing back on a continuous loop.
A simple "yes" would suffice.
Is he clear? Yes.
Yes.
Think they're watching? They are definitely watching.
translation.it: - Credi ci stiano osservando? - Non c'è alcun dubbio.

translation.en: Travis, stop!
What are you doing?
You said you didn't want anyone else to die.
translation.it: Dici che non vuoi che muoia nessun altro.

translation.en: Yeah, and that included you.
I'll radio when I'm safe.
translation.it: Vi contatto via radio quando sono al sicuro.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Let's go.
I was personally put in charge of Glen Damone's protection. Know who that is?
translation.it: Sono stato incaricato personalmente di proteggere Glen Damone. Sai chi è?

translation.en: The mafia accountant.
Trial lasted five months, no less than 20 bounties on his head.
translation.it: Il processo è durato cinque mesi, con almeno 20 taglie sulla sua testa.

translation.en: He never got one scratch under my watch.
translation.it: Non si è mai fatto un graffio con me.

translation.en: Wait. Wasn't he assassinated shortly after the trial?
translation.it: Ma scusa, non è stato ucciso subito dopo il processo?

translation.en: That was on Witness Protection, not me.
translation.it: Era sotto scorta, non stava con me.

translation.en: Watch your head.
When they clear the compound, take out the driver.
translation.it: Quando la struttura è stata evacuata, fa' uscire l'autista.

translation.en: If anyone kills Scorpion, they die next.
translation.it: Chi uccide Scorpion, è il prossimo a morire.

translation.en: MAN [ON COMM]: Roger that.
MAN: They're leaving the facility. Take him out.
translation.it: - Stanno lasciando la struttura. - Fallo uscire.

translation.en: You'd be wise to take cover. What?
translation.it: - È meglio se ti metti al riparo. - Cosa?

translation.en: Duck!
Oh, shit. They're under attack.
We gotta go. WARD: Let's move!
Where are you going? To help.
You're not field. Help from here. Find out where the backup is!
translation.it: - Tu aiuterai da qui. - Chiama i rinforzi!

translation.en: WOMAN: Dispatch. This is Seattle S.W.A.T.
translation.it: - Dispaccio. - È la SWAT di Seattle.

translation.en: We're under heavy attack and need immediate assistance.
translation.it: Siamo sotto attacco, necessitiamo assistenza immediata.

translation.en: WOMAN: Roger that, Seattle S.W.A.T.
Hang tight.
Backup's on its way.
SCORPION: Commander?
Go! Go! Go!
I've got the shot.
Not on my shift, motherfucker.
translation.it: Non nel mio turno, figlio di puttana.

translation.en: Fuck!
Do not let him get away!
Commander, nice of you to join us.
translation.it: Comandante, grazie per esserti unito a noi.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Son of a bitch.
Back to the compound. Move it. Now!
Holy fuck.
MAN 1: Left, left, left.
Clear. MAN 2: Clear! Go!
Get the truck out.
Everyone, inside! Gutierrez, I'm on the move!
translation.it: - Tutti dentro. - Gutierrez. - Sto partendo. - Vai, vai!

translation.en: Go, go!
Dwyer, shut us down!
I'm on it. Shut us down now!
What part of "we need him alive" do they not understand?
translation.it: Cosa non hanno capito di "lo vogliamo vivo"?

translation.en: Are those shields?
Well, you have to admire their resilience.
translation.it: Beh, la loro capacità di ripresa è ammirevole.

translation.en: Nicholas,
can you open them?
It's one thing to hack their comms and cameras,
translation.it: Una cosa è hackerare i comandi e le telecamere...

translation.en: but shields are controlled by the internal mainframe.
translation.it: ...ma gli scudi dipendono dal sistema centrale.

translation.en: It'd need to be taken out before I can do anything.
translation.it: Bisogna estrarlo prima di poter agire.

translation.en: LARS: Find a way past those shields.
Leave the rest to me. In the meantime, kill the power.
translation.it: Lascia il resto a me. Per ora, stacca la luce.

translation.en: Kill everything.
Ready the next wave, and let's see how resilient they truly are.
translation.it: Fino alla prossima ondata, vediamo quanto riescono davvero a riprendersi.

translation.en: Got that?
TRAVIS: Where's the backup, Elson?
What the fuck happened?
Hold up, hold up. What are you doing?
I assure you, Inspector, what's out there is far more dangerous to you than me.
translation.it: Ispettore, le assicuro che là fuori è molto più pericoloso per lei che per me.

translation.en: They're only dangerous to us because of you.
translation.it: Sono pericolosi per noi a causa tua.

translation.en: You brought this to our door, all of it, and I can end it right now.
translation.it: Sei tu che ce li hai portati qui, e potrei farla finita subito.

translation.en: And you think killing me will stop this war?
translation.it: Crede che uccidermi metterà fine a questa guerra?

translation.en: Ellen, this isn't who we are.
Now what? What's going on, Elson?
ELSON: Yeah, they cut the comm and power, and judging by the signal on my cell,
translation.it: Hanno staccato i comandi e l'elettricità, e a giudicare dal mio telefono...

translation.en: they're jamming the cell tower too.
Fuck. Any satellite phones on-site?
translation.it: - ...stanno staccando anche il ripetitore. - Cazzo. Qualcuno ha un cellulare satellitare?

translation.en: ELSON: Yeah, none that are working.
Why are cameras working but not Internet or phones?
translation.it: Reimpostare il collegamento Perché le telecamere funzionano ma Internet e i telefoni no?

translation.en: In cases like this, you wanna see.
translation.it: Si vede in casi come questo.

translation.en: So we put security separate on the internal mainframe.
translation.it: La sicurezza è sul sistema interno.

translation.en: And they would want to see as well.
They hacked the security cameras.
translation.it: Hanno hackerato le telecamere di sicurezza.

translation.en: They can do that? It's not that hard.
translation.it: - Ci sono riusciti? - Non è complicato.

translation.en: For somebody who's good enough, it's not.
translation.it: Se uno è bravo, non è difficile.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Cut the interior security cameras.
Don't let them see what we're doing.
translation.it: - Così non vedono cosa stiamo facendo. - Ricevuto.

translation.en: ELSON: Copy that.
translation.it: - Così non vedono cosa stiamo facendo. - Ricevuto. Telecamere di sicurezza Interno

translation.en: SCORPION: You must get this through your skulls.
translation.it: NESSUN SEGNALE VIDEO Mettetevelo bene in testa.

translation.en: These are professional soldiers. They will isolate you, intimidate you
translation.it: Sono militari professionisti. Vi isoleranno, vi minacceranno...

translation.en: until they find your weakest link and then exploit it.
I thought you said the phones were out. They are.
translation.it: Avevi detto che i telefoni non funzionavano.

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hello?
Commander Hall?
Yeah.
I'm the man in control of the small army sitting on your doorstep.
translation.it: Sono quello che controlla l'esercito fuori dalla tua porta.

translation.en: Do you have a moment to chat?
If you want me on speaker, go ahead. I understand.
translation.it: Se vuoi mettermi in vivavoce, fai pure, posso capire.

translation.en: Everyone should hear.
I should've done this earlier.
It would've saved us all a lot of time, sweat
translation.it: Ci avrebbe risparmiato un sacco di tempo, di sudore...

translation.en: and blood.
I have your compound surrounded.
Your power, your network,
all of your communications are down.
No one knows that you're in trouble, and no one's coming to help.
translation.it: Nessuno sa che siete in pericolo, né sta venendo in soccorso.

translation.en: Your officer spoke to my associate, Simone,
translation.it: Il vostro agente ha parlato alla mia collega, Simone...

translation.en: not the dispatch operator.
Hello.
The man you pulled out of a box belongs to me.
translation.it: L'uomo che avete tirato fuori dalla scatola mi appartiene.

translation.en: Hand him over
and I'll go away.
Just like that?
Just like that.
Can't do it.
I know you're listening.
Tell these people who I am.
His name is Lars Cohagen.
He runs a private military corporation
that specializes in dark ops. The kind that overthrow small countries?
translation.it: - ...specializzato in missioni segrete. - Tipo rovesciare piccoli Paesi?

translation.en: Some not so small. Hm.
Now that we're all in the know,
why don't you come on out and spare the lives of these nice people?
translation.it: ...perché non uscite e risparmiate così la vita di questa brava gente?

translation.en: Let them return home and enjoy what's left of the holiday.
translation.it: Fateli tornare a casa a godersi il giorno di festa.

translation.en: They could still catch the fireworks.
translation.it: In tempo per i fuochi d'artificio.

translation.en: How many times are we going to go through this?
This is it.
This is our last dance.
I've heard this before.
Commander Hall, the man you're protecting is a consummate liar.
translation.it: Comandante Hall, l'uomo che protegge è un truffatore consumato.

translation.en: His skills of deception supersede even mine.
translation.it: È addirittura più abile di me.

translation.en: In fact, I will guarantee that he's lying to you right now.
translation.it: Le garantisco che le sta mentendo.

translation.en: Has he told you there's one in your organization that's against you?
translation.it: Le ha detto che ci sono dei traditori nella sua organizzazione?

translation.en: Or that he has information that could set the world ablaze?
translation.it: O che ha informazioni che scateneranno la guerra?

translation.en: He's a liar
and a killer and nothing more.
translation.it: ...e non è altro che un assassino.

translation.en: All your problems go away if you just
translation.it: Tutti i suoi problemi avranno fine...

translation.en: turn him over.
And I already told you,
I'm not doing that.
Commander, so this stranger's life
translation.it: Comandante... ...la vita di questo sconosciuto è più importante di quelle dei suoi colleghi?

translation.en: is more important to you than your team's?
translation.it: ...la vita di questo sconosciuto è più importante di quelle dei suoi colleghi?

translation.en: What about Daniel Chu?
David Jefferson?
Luis and Maria Gutierrez?
Carley and Rebecca?
Is Scorpion's life worth more to you than their lives?
translation.it: La vita di Scorpion vale di più delle loro?

translation.en: Are all their lives worth Scorpion's to you?
translation.it: Le loro vite sono allo stesso livello di quella di Scorpion?

translation.en: Enough. I'm coming out.
But before I do,
I want your guarantee.
No harm comes to anyone here, nor their families.
translation.it: Non deve accadere nulla a chi è qua dentro, né alle loro famiglie.

translation.en: You have my word.
I will be out in 10 minutes.
You'd better be.
ELSON: Commander, try the phone again. Maybe we have a live line out.
translation.it: Comandante, riprova il telefono. Forse fuori c'è linea.

translation.en: TRAVIS: No...
Shit.
TRAVIS: You're not giving yourself up.
translation.it: - Non ti starai dando per vinto? - Assolutamente no.

translation.en: I never said I was. I only said I was coming out.
translation.it: - Non ti starai dando per vinto? - Assolutamente no. Ho solo detto che sarei uscito.

translation.en: You think you can take on this whole army alone? I work best alone.
translation.it: - Credi di poter battere un esercito? - Lavoro meglio da solo.

translation.en: With the shields down, this place can withstand a riot.
translation.it: Con gli scudi, questo posto può resistere a una rivolta.

translation.en: You don't have to go.
WARD: Hold on a second. I'm confused.
You giving yourself up or not? He's not.
translation.it: - Ti stai dando per vinto? - No.

translation.en: We can't let him. HOOKS: Yes, we can.
Did you not see that army out there?
We just lost Phil and Benson.
translation.it: Abbiamo già perso Phil e Benson.

translation.en: I don't plan to join them because of this son of a bitch.
translation.it: Non voglio raggiungerli per colpa di questo stronzo.

translation.en: You heard him, Commander.
He's threatening our families, and there's no backup.
translation.it: Minaccia le nostre famiglie, e non ci sono rinforzi.

translation.en: This guy's a fucking liar. He could be playing us. Let him go.
translation.it: È un truffatore. Ci prende in giro. Lasciamolo andare.

translation.en: No. We're not giving in to this Lars asshole.
translation.it: No. Non lo consegneremo a quel coglione di Lars.

translation.en: Not after all that's happened.
It ain't his fault a lunatic's shooting up the building.
translation.it: Non è colpa sua se un pazzo ci sta sparando.

translation.en: Maybe it is. We don't know.
Scorpion could've escaped or killed us several times.
translation.it: Scorpion sarebbe potuto evadere e averci sparato varie volte.

translation.en: He didn't. I believe him.
translation.it: Ma non l'ha fatto. Io gli credo.

translation.en: That just might mean that he needed our help to survive.
translation.it: Forse aveva solo bisogno del nostro aiuto per sopravvivere.

translation.en: That doesn't disprove what Lars said.
Believe Lars when he says he will stop at nothing
translation.it: Lars sarà disposto a fare qualunque cosa...

translation.en: to find a way inside to get me.
If I do not come out now, that army outside,
those phony agents,
they are just the tip of the iceberg.
You're right.
We'll put you by the back door.
Only it won't be you.
Heh. In theory, it should work. I loaded everything you'll need on the laptop.
translation.it: Dovrebbe funzionare, le ho messo tutto sul computer.

translation.en: You should be good to go.
translation.it: Dovrebbe avere tutto ciò che serve.

translation.en: I wanna thank you for your assistance today, Nicholas.
translation.it: Grazie per il tuo aiuto di oggi, Nicholas.

translation.en: Oh, my pleasure, sir.
Did you know that Scorpion and I used to be partners?
translation.it: Sai che io e Scorpion eravamo colleghi?

translation.en: Right. You were saying.
It was great for a while,
translation.it: Per un po' è andata benissimo...

translation.en: and then five years ago in Berlin, he betrayed me.
translation.it: ...e cinque anni fa, a Berlino, mi ha tradito.

translation.en: After all we'd been through.
translation.it: Dopo tutto quello che avevamo passato.

translation.en: You know, and I knew it.
I knew something was wrong, but I didn't react in time.
translation.it: Sapevo che qualcosa non andava ma non ho reagito in tempo.

translation.en: Since then, I've taken greater precaution in my business dealings, because
translation.it: Da allora sono stato sempre molto prudente negli affari perché...

translation.en: no matter how much you think you know someone,
translation.it: ...anche se pensi di conoscere bene qualcuno...

translation.en: they could stab you in the back.
Do you understand what I'm saying?
Yeah, I think so.
Good.
WARD: All right, let me get this straight.
You wanna raise the door shields and let the army in?
translation.it: Vuoi disattivare gli scudi e far entrare l'esercito?

translation.en: That's your plan? Not let them in. Lure them close, then ambush them.
translation.it: Voglio attirarli all'interno, e fargli un'imboscata.

translation.en: Why won't that work?
Because it's batshit crazy.
TRAVIS: We're not turning this man over to mercenaries.
translation.it: Non esiste che lasciamo quest'uomo in mano a dei mercenari.

translation.en: Once they're in the courtyard, we've got them trapped.
translation.it: Una volta dentro il cortile, sono in trappola.

translation.en: How do you figure that?
The back door is located in the deepest part of the courtyard.
translation.it: La porta sul retro è posizionata in fondo al cortile.

translation.en: Here.
Now, about three dozen office windows look down onto it.
translation.it: Ci sono almeno tre dozzine di finestre che vi si affacciano.

translation.en: That's where we'll be.
We'll make them think we're handing you over.
translation.it: Gli facciamo credere che vi stiamo consegnando.

translation.en: To sell it, Elson will figure out a way to open the rear entrance shield.
translation.it: Elson troverà un modo per aprire lo scudo dell'entrata posteriore.

translation.en: Now, once they get eyes on the bait,
they're gonna move in underneath our hidden positions,
and that's when we hit 'em.
They'll be sitting ducks.
It's the first time the shields have ever been activated.
translation.it: È la prima volta in assoluto che gli scudi vengono attivati.

translation.en: I've never done, nor am I even sure
that isolated openings will work as you describe them.
translation.it: ...e non sono sicuro che funzioni aprirne soltanto alcuni.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you'll figure it out.
They'll be expecting something like that.
TRAVIS: Well, this is our only option.
translation.it: Beh, è la nostra unica opzione.

translation.en: They got us boxed in.
We can't call out, and you said it yourself.
translation.it: Non possiamo uscire, l'hai detto tu stesso.

translation.en: It's only a matter of time till he finds his way in.
translation.it: Loro entreranno, è solo una questione di tempo.

translation.en: At least this way, it's on our own terms.
translation.it: Almeno così, facciamo noi le regole.

translation.en: Look, guys, this isn't an order.
translation.it: Ragazzi, ascoltate, non vi sto dando un ordine.

translation.en: I'm not forcing you into this.
But I, for one, don't wanna sit around and let someone else determine my fate.
translation.it: Ma io non voglio stare fermo ad aspettare che altri decidano per me.

translation.en: If I'm going out,
it's gonna be on my terms, not theirs.
translation.it: ...faccio il mio gioco, non il loro.

translation.en: If this is what you want, I will need firepower.
translation.it: Se siete d'accordo, devo avere una grossa potenza di fuoco.

translation.en: TRAVIS: We've got every weapon known to man.
What exactly are you looking for?
I will know it when I see it. TRAVIS: We aim to please.
translation.it: - Lo saprò quando lo troverò. - Siamo qui per servirla.

translation.en: TRAVIS: In the meantime, spread out and load up.
Just because I'm browsing don't mean I'm giving up on you.
translation.it: Solo perché gironzolo non vuol dire che non ti osservo.

translation.en: What the fuck do you do with that?
You don't want anything to do with that.
That's when you got nothing to live for.
translation.it: Questo è per chi non ha motivi per vivere.

translation.en: HOOKS: Hey.
Oh, never mind.
What did you find?
Excellent. WARD: Why?
Our regular radios still work.
He may have tapped into those frequencies.
He will not be able to do so with this model.
translation.it: Ma non saprà farlo con questo modello.

translation.en: Okay. Everyone grab one.
You gotta change.
TRAVIS: How'd you get the name Scorpion, anyway?
translation.it: Perché hai scelto di chiamarti Scorpion?

translation.en: I assume that's not on your birth certificate.
translation.it: Credo che non sia sul tuo certificato di nascita.

translation.en: SCORPION: You are assuming I have a birth certificate.
translation.it: Sempre che io abbia un certificato di nascita.

translation.en: Heh. All right, you're not gonna tell me your name.
translation.it: Sempre che io abbia un certificato di nascita. Bene, non vuoi dirmi come ti chiami.

translation.en: At least you can tell me how you know Lars Cohagen.
translation.it: Almeno dimmi come hai conosciuto Lars Cohagen.

translation.en: We were once partners.
I never said I was a good man, Commander, just good at what I do.
translation.it: Non sono un brav'uomo, sono solo bravo a fare il mio mestiere.

translation.en: You do not know me, Commander.
You should not be taking this risk.
Even holiday double-time ain't enough to deal with this shit today.
translation.it: Neanche le doppie ferie sono sufficienti per tutta la merda di oggi.

translation.en: You know, the job is risk.
It's not about or for you.
Not any longer.
Our guys' blood's been spilled today.
translation.it: Dei colleghi hanno versato il loro sangue oggi.

translation.en: Someone's gonna pay for that.
SCORPION: There is one thing you have not addressed.
translation.it: C'è una cosa che non hai calcolato.

translation.en: The person on the inside who is working against us.
translation.it: La persona all'interno che lavora contro di noi.

translation.en: When they attacked the van, they were waiting for us.
translation.it: Quando hanno attaccato il van, ci stavano aspettando.

translation.en: Someone told Lars you were taking me from the compound.
translation.it: Qualcuno ha detto a Lars che mi stavi portando fuori.

translation.en: ELLEN [ON COMM]: Two-minute warning.
Copy that. Everyone get in position.
We go on my call. Copy that.
Good luck.
Never really believed in luck.
translation.it: Non ho mai creduto molto alla fortuna.

translation.en: Well, good luck anyway.
Everyone set? Know what they're doing?
translation.it: Tutti ai loro posti? Sapete cosa fare?

translation.en: ALL: Yes, sir.
Sof, you remember Suffolk, a few years back?
translation.it: Sof, ricordi Suffolk, qualche anno fa?

translation.en: Yeah.
That was another supposedly cakewalk mission
translation.it: Doveva essere un gioco da ragazzi...

translation.en: that turned into a shitshow.
translation.it: ...che si è trasformato in un putiferio.

translation.en: What was it, 40 gangbangers against eight S.W.A.T.?
I tell people I never know how we survived that night.
translation.it: Lo racconto sempre, non so come siamo sopravvissuti.

translation.en: But I do know...
we're S.W.A.T.
We're the baddest motherfuckers on Earth.
translation.it: I figli di puttana più tosti del mondo.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Let's get in position.
Take care of each other.
The least he could've done was give us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.it: Ci potrebbe dare il microchip da barattare con le nostre vite.

translation.en: There's no microchip. It's in his head.
translation.it: Non ha un microchip. È tutto nella sua testa.

translation.en: Hey, make sure we're in position before--
Hey. It's not my first rodeo.
Don't fuck up.
How we looking?
When we get the go, I just hit enter, and it'll raise the rear-entrance shield.
translation.it: Al via, do l'avvio e lo scudo della porta sul retro si alzerà.

translation.en: But not the rest of the building? Right. Just the rear entrance.
translation.it: - Ma non del resto dell'edificio? - No, solo dell'entrata sul retro.

translation.en: In theory.
In theory?
In theory.
MAN 1: Position! Hold that position!
MAN 2: All right, let's go.
MAN 1: Left, left, left.
SIMONE: No sign of Scorpion.
Commander, is your team ready?
Let's go around the horn.
Hooks, set.
Jefferson, set. York, set.
translation.it: - Jefferson, in posizione. - York, in posizione.

translation.en: Gutierrez, set. Chu, set.
translation.it: - Gutierrez, in posizione. - Chu, in posizione.

translation.en: Ward, are you in position?
Sorry, I was using the wrong mic.
We're all set.
Raise the shield. Copy.
It worked.
SIMONE: Right on time.
They're opening the shields by the rear entrance. Move in.
translation.it: Stanno aprendo lo scudo dell'entrata sul retro. Entrate.

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON COMM]: Here they come. Get ready.
SIMONE: Third-floor window.
What is that?
Morse code.
Pull everyone back. It's a trap.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Everyone move back. Now.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. He's stopping. Why is he stopping?
Hey!
TRAVIS: The fuck just happened?
Everybody fall back to the command center.
ELLEN [ON COMM]: Copy. Everyone fall back.
Fuck.
Elson, close the rear shields. I'm on it.
translation.it: - Elson, abbassa lo scudo sul retro. - Subito.

translation.en: Where's everybody else? Ward, I don't know.
translation.it: - Dove sono tutti? - Ward, non lo so.

translation.en: Scorpion's M.I.A.
Dwyer left a few minutes ago. Where?
We saw a light at the third-floor window
translation.it: Abbiamo visto una luce al terzo piano...

translation.en: and she just bolted. A flash of light?
translation.it: - ...ed è corsa via. - A quale finestra?

translation.en: Which window? Right there.
translation.it: - ...ed è corsa via. - A quale finestra? Laggiù.

translation.en: Stay here. Keep an eye on everything outside.
Where are you going? Find the big guy.
translation.it: - Dove vai? - A cercare il ragazzone.

translation.en: Scorpion, come in.
Scorpion, do you copy?
Get up.
I'm gonna let you out of here.
You're gonna tell Lars I'm gonna find another way to give him Scorpion.
translation.it: Dirai a Lars che troverò un altro modo di consegnargli Scorpion.

translation.en: No one else needs to die.
Shit, it was you.
Yeah, I'll tell him. Lead the way.
translation.it: Sì, glielo dico io. Portami da lui.

translation.en: WARD: The amount is the same upon delivery. Fifty million. That hasn't changed.
translation.it: La cifra resta la stessa per la consegna. Cinquanta milioni, come prima.

translation.en: Fifty million's a sweet fucking payday for a cop.
translation.it: Cinquanta milioni è una buona diaria per un poliziotto.

translation.en: Those DEA assholes are always skimming off the top.
translation.it: Quegli stronzi della DEA prendono sempre il meglio.

translation.en: About time I got some. Of course, it is.
translation.it: - Ma col tempo ho imparato. - Certo.

translation.en: Hey. This mess is Hall's fault. If he had handed over Scorpion--
translation.it: - Ma col tempo ho imparato. - Certo. Questo casino è colpa di Hall. Se ci avesse dato Scorpion--

translation.en: What the hell's the plan on getting me out of here?
translation.it: Quale cazzo è il piano per farmi uscire di qui?

translation.en: We're gonna cut the power to the mainframe.
Once the shields are up, Lars can take care of the rest.
translation.it: Con gli scudi alzati, Lars farà il resto.

translation.en: Where are the controls? Engineering room.
translation.it: - Dove sono i comandi? - In sala macchine.

translation.en: Thanks.
ELLEN: Ward?
Fuck.
TRAVIS: Ellen.
You all right? Yeah.
It was Ward.
I saw him talking to Franklin before Franklin killed him.
translation.it: Franklin l'ha ucciso dopo che hanno parlato.

translation.en: Where'd he go? In there.
Yeah? Ready?
See that?
CHU: What just happened? Security feed's been cut.
translation.it: - Cos'è successo? - Le telecamere di sicurezza sono spente.

translation.en: We're blind outside now, too. You said the feed was internal.
translation.it: - Non vediamo più fuori. - Ma non erano interne?

translation.en: It is.
Without it, I've lost control of our security system. What does that mean?
translation.it: - Non ho più il controllo della sicurezza. - In che senso?

translation.en: What I mean is the same crazy fuck that's been attacking us can open our shields,
translation.it: Che la stessa cosa che ci sta attaccando può anche disattivare gli scudi...

translation.en: and there is nothing that we can do about it.
Closer.
Clear.
What the fuck is happening? The shields are raising.
translation.it: - Cosa succede? - Gli scudi si stanno alzando.

translation.en: YORK: Can you stop it? ELSON: No.
What do you think he's gonna fucking do, huh?
Oh, yeah.
ELLEN: Travis!
SIMONE: Intel from Berlin.
Dead or alive no longer matters.
translation.it: Vivo o morto non importa più.

translation.en: I will go in there and fucking kill him myself if I have to!
translation.it: Vado dentro a ucciderlo io se è necessario.

translation.en: Go!
Everyone, move in.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Shoot to kill Scorpion on sight.
MAN: Let's go! Let's go!
Oh, shit.
Everyone fall back. Let's go. Come on.
TRAVIS: Go, go, go, go, go, go!
Elson, come on.
MAN: After those guys! Let's go!
TRAVIS: Clear!
Move, move, move, move!
YORK: Let's go! Let's go!
Man down!
HOOKS: Jefferson, come on!
Go!
Later, bitches.
Get over yourself.
Let's go. Go.
Duck.
Oh, you meant that kind of firepower.
SCORPION: I have something to show you.
The way out.
I found a maintenance tunnel.
translation.it: Ho trovato un tunnel di servizio.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Yeah, it's been sealed.
SCORPION: Not anymore.
Nope. Fuck that. Hey, it's either that,
translation.it: - No, che cazzo. - Scegli: o questo...

translation.en: or you go back out there to face a bunch of badass dudes shooting at you.
translation.it: ...o torni ad affrontare quella banda di criminali che ti sparano dietro.

translation.en: All right, give me a boost. Okay.
ELSON: Fuck.
CHU: Right behind you, Elson. ELSON: Okay.
Travis. I'm going after Dwyer.
No way I'm leaving one of our own behind.
translation.it: Non lascerò mai che qualcuno rimanga indietro.

translation.en: Get 'em to safety, okay?
You don't know how many of them are still up there.
translation.it: Non sai quanti ne siano rimasti là sopra.

translation.en: Or if she's even alive. I'm gonna be fine.
translation.it: - Né se lei è ancora viva. - Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: Go on. I'm not letting you go alone.
translation.it: - Andate. - Non ti farò andare da solo.

translation.en: He won't be.
I'll call for backup as soon as I can.
You don't have to do this. I know.
You didn't have to come back just for us.
translation.it: Non dovevi tornare solo per noi.

translation.en: I didn't.
TRAVIS: Looks like everybody cleared out.
translation.it: Sembra che se ne siano andati tutti.

translation.en: SCORPION: Unlikely.
Lars would never give up.
At least I got you.
Now let us see if you can finish the job.
translation.it: Ora vediamo se riesci a finire il lavoro.

translation.en: Hey.
[SIGHS] Hey.
What happened? It's over.
Good guys won. Come on.
TRAVIS: We lost York and Jefferson.
ELLEN: Oh, God, no. TRAVIS: Yeah.
ELLEN: What about Scorpion? TRAVIS: Yeah, he's still alive...
somehow.
Still no signal? TRAVIS: No.
Gutierrez said she'd call it in when they got out.
translation.it: Gutierrez ha detto che avrebbe avvertito quando uscivano.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Cell towers must still be jammed.
But it shouldn't be too long now,
translation.it: ...ma non dovrebbero esserlo ancora per molto...

translation.en: which means you need to disappear.
I don't know if I have it in me to run anymore.
translation.it: Non so se ho voglia di scappare ancora.

translation.en: I am constantly running.
That and all the people trying to kill me...
It's exhausting. [CHUCKLES]
You got all that money in your head. Why not just retire?
translation.it: Hai un sacco di soldi in testa. Perché non vai in pensione?

translation.en: That is blood money.
As a matter of fact...
Dude, what the fuck?
Take it.
What the hell is it?
SCORPION: It's what all the fuss is about.
translation.it: Ciò che ha scatenato tutto questo delirio.

translation.en: A microchip.
What's in your head. That's clever.
And now it's better in your hands.
translation.it: E adesso sta meglio in mano tua.

translation.en: ELLEN: Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.it: Questa notte, un container è arrivato a Monfell da Bogotá.

translation.en: Yeah, what'd he turn out to be? A guy in a box.
translation.it: E alla fine, che cos'era? Un uomo in una scatola.

translation.en: ELLEN: The least he could've done was given us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.it: Ci potrebbe almeno dare il microchip da barattare con le nostre vite.

translation.en: TRAVIS: There's no microchip.
Ellen, what are you doing? It's nothing personal, Travis.
translation.it: - Ellen, cosa fai? - Nulla di personale, Travis.

translation.en: ELLEN: You should have just handed Scorpion over, Travis.
translation.it: Avresti semplicemente dovuto consegnare Scorpion, Travis.

translation.en: No one was supposed to get hurt. You should've just let it go.
translation.it: Non doveva farsi male nessuno. Avresti dovuto lasciar perdere.

translation.en: Don't.
Don't.
It's over.
MAN: What did I say?
Good? Yeah.
SOPHIA: FBI was onto her.
And she knew.
I never liked her.
What is that?
A souvenir.
MAN: Excuse me, Commander.
Can I ask you to come and identify the body?
translation.it: Posso chiederle di venire a identificare il corpo?

translation.en: MAN: Is this the man known as Scorpion?
That's-- That's him.
MAN: Okay. Take him away, guys.
Is there something you wanna tell me?
TRAVIS: Yeah, but for your protection, I'd better not.
translation.it: Sì, ma per la tua sicurezza, è meglio di no.

translation.en: The less you know...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hey, hon.
How's the party going? CARLEY: Travis, oh, my God.
translation.it: - Come sta andando la festa? - Travis, mio Dio.

translation.en: I've been worried sick. Are you okay? TRAVIS: Yeah, I'm-- I'm fine. I'm on my way.
translation.it: - Ero preoccupata a morte. Stai bene? - Sì, sto... bene. Sto tornando.

translation.en: I'll tell you about it when I get up there, okay? I love you.
translation.it: Poi ti racconto quando arrivo, d'accordo? Ti amo.

translation.en: CARLEY: Purple. BECKY: P-U-R-P-L-E.
CARLEY: Three. BECKY: One, two, three.
Four. Four.
Hi, Daddy.
Hi, sweetheart. Oh. You look like you could use a beer.
translation.it: - Ciao, tesoro. - Sembra che tu abbia voglia di una birra.

translation.en: Or 20.
Hey, what's this? Hey.
Yeah.
TRAVIS: This is enough.
For me.
Just you...
and her.
I don't need anything more.
But I'm pregnant.
Are you kidding me? Surprise.
TRAVIS: Is that what you were trying to tell me? Yeah.
translation.it: - Era quello che stavi cercando di dirmi? - Sì.

translation.en: Did you know about this?
Yeah, I could tell.
The two of you...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hall here.
MAN [ON PHONE]: Commander, we got a shitshow brewing
translation.it: Sono Hall. Comandante, è successo un casino al Campidoglio di Olympia.

translation.en: at the capitol building in downtown Olympia.
translation.it: Comandante, è successo un casino al Campidoglio di Olympia.

translation.en: We need you and your team on-scene ASAP.
translation.it: Abbiamo bisogno al più presto di lei e della sua squadra.

translation.en: Closed Captions: Katie Radford
